sentences.en: Daphne Farlow, at forty-five, still looked and spoke like an overgrown schoolgirl.

sentences.en: The plucky schoolgirl amazed doctors by hanging on to life for nearly two months.

sentences.en: When I a schoolgirl , sad to say, I longed to shower my teachers with presents.
